title: Not Good at Cheating, Vacation VS Pay Raise, Truth Be Told, Ask Steve and more.
itunes:title: Not Good at Cheating, Vacation VS Pay Raise, Truth Be Told, Ask Steve and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! It's the beginning of a new week, but it is the same damn thing. This ignorance is turnt all the way up and Shirley is in rare form!!! We all know the moment we get caught and know that we are not good at cheating. What is more important to you more vacation time or more money? Junior has Truth Be Told and tells us how he really feels about that one unhappy friend. Is children behavior different when their parents are much older than their friends parents? We all find out the biggest lies ever told by the crew. Junior comes clean with all his family grudges! In Ask Steve, Big Dog answers questions about his dreams and what annoys him. Today in Closing Remarks, The CEO tells us what is on the other side of fear, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
